content: This spot was cool but very busy.
Stop didn't match reviews. It was quite small and relatively dirty. Only come here if you don't mind rubbing shoulders with 10 other people!
Would recommend this place to everyone. There's no way you'll have a bad time if you come!
The best stop I've found on this app, hands down.
I had a good time here. Cool stop that's pretty easy to find just off the road. It would be better if you came bright and early because there were a ton of people and not much room.
Pretty decent stop. There are a lot of places nearby for good food and ammenities.
Loved the view! The kids had a great time, we'll be back.
Had a really fun time here!
Friend told me about this place and I wasn't dissapointed. Make sure to bring decent shoes though, paths are slippery in the rain.
Not the best smelling place but there are plenty of picnic tables to enjoy the afternoon.
